summary:
Hedonism is all about prioritizing pleasure in life. It can mean different things in various fields like philosophy, art, and psychology. Basically, it's when someone focuses on enjoying themselves, either through physical senses or mentally. 

In simple terms, hedonists seek happiness and try to avoid pain. They believe that feeling good and avoiding suffering is what life is all about. This can sometimes be seen as selfish, especially if people only think about their own pleasure without considering others.
title: Hedonism
